app.name: Omegatics for Support
app.short_description: Displays customer and order details from Omegatics.
app.long_description:
The Omegatics app for Zendesk unites your business by displaying critical Omegatics data to your agents while they serve customers in Zendesk. 
The application queries your Omegatics database to find the customerâ€™s details and recent orders. In addition, it displays order summary information if a chat or ticket is linked to an individual order.
app.installation_instructions:
1. Install Omegatics for Support app. 
2. The integration will automatically setup the Omegatics for Support app in Zendesk Support Apps.
